author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Atos 2017 Net Income Group Share Rises To 601 Million Euros
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - ATOS:
* 2017 OPERATING MARGIN AT € 1.3 BILLION, 10% OF REVENUE, +18% ORGANICALLY
* 2017 REVENUE AT € 12.7 BILLION +10% AT CONSTANT EXCHANGE RATES +2.3% ORGANICALLY
* 2017 NET INCOME GROUP SHARE +11% AT € 601 MILLION * STRONGER FINANCIAL OBJECTIVES IN 2018 CONFIRMING 2019 AMBITION TARGETS
* SEES FOR 2018 REVENUE ORGANIC GROWTH: +2% TO +3%; OPERATING MARGIN: 10.5% TO 11% OF REVENUE
* SEES FOR 2018 FREE CASH FLOW: CIRCA 60% OF OPERATING MARGIN
* PROPOSES DIVIDEND OF EUR 1.70 PER SHARE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom:)
